article.title: Information Networks
article.author: Becker, J.Olsen, W.C.
article.text: In the literature, active network plans and developments appear to cluster in three main areas: (1) Education, (2) Libraries, and (3) Government, Industry, and Professional Societies. These network groupings are described in this chapter following a discussion of network definitions, concepts, and current impetus. References to information systems are included when there is an indication that a particular system will probably be transformed into a network.
